text: Guoguang Laboratory School, National Sun Yat-sen University (GGSH or KKSH; ) is a public high school located in Nanzih District, Kaohsiung, Taiwan. It is also an affiliated school of National Sun Yat-sen University - one of top university in Taiwan. ==See also== * Oil Refinery Elementary School Station * National Sun Yat-sen University * CPC Corporation * Secondary education in Taiwan ==External links== *School's website Category:Schools in Kaohsiung Category:High schools in Taiwan Category:1959 establishments in Taiwan
title: Guoguang Laboratory School, National Sun Yat-sen University
